sentences.cn: 她那女人味十足的婀娜身段

sentences.en: Here are a few tips on how to keep womanly heart beating as strong as ever.
sentences.cn: 这里有几条如何保持妇女心脏强健的建议.

sentences.en: Persistence and courage are the most womanly no less than the most manly qualitiesMargaret Fuller.
sentences.cn: 毅力和勇气就象适用男性一样适用女性(玛格丽特·夫乐尔).

sentences.en: She showed a womanly concern for their health.
sentences.cn: 她无微不至地关心他们的健康.

sentences.en: The sight of him filled her with a womanly sympathy.
sentences.cn: 一看到他,她心中就涌起同情怜悯之情.

sentences.en: Twenty - eight years of womanly life and all so lonesome.
sentences.cn: 二十八年 的闺房生活却如此寂寥.

sentences.en: With shrewd tact and womanly kindness Nadyezhda had won his complete trust.
sentences.cn: 娜蒂契达以她的精明机智和女性的好心肠赢得了他完全的信任.

sentences.en: Yet if looking womanly can seem unprofessional, its also possible to not look feminine enough.
sentences.cn: 然而,如果看起来女性化可能显得不够专业的话, 那么不够女性化也可能也有问题.

sentences.en: You may have noticed, Mrs Jordan, that we are finally around to respecting your womanly judgment.
sentences.cn: 你可能注意到了, 乔丹女士, 我们兜了一大圈最后终于尊重起你的妇女的判断力来了.

words.tran_cn: 女子气的；柔弱的；适于女子的
女人；女人气质；女子成年期
玩弄女性者；沉溺于女色的人

trans.tran_cn: 女性特有的；女子般的；适合女人的
trans.tran_en: behaving, dressing etc in a way that is thought to be typical of or suitable for a woman – used to show approval

trans.tran_cn: 像女人地；适合于妇女地
